caption.center: ALSTON v. DIRECTOR OF PATUXENT INSTITUTION

opinion.posture:
Application for leave to appeal from the Criminal Court of Baltimore County (CULLEN, J.).
Arthur Eugene Alston instituted a proceeding under the Post Conviction Procedure Act, and from a denial of relief, he applied for leave to appeal.
Application denied.
opinion.panel: Before HAMMOND, C.J., and HORNEY, MARBURY, OPPENHEIMER, BARNES and McWILLIAMS, JJ.Page 714
opinion.opinion_text:
For the reasons assigned by Judge Cullen in the court below, the application for leave to appeal must be denied.
Application denied.
